situation.title: Tourism in the CZ
situation.meta_description: It is now not possible to travel to the Czech Republic for tourism or to visit friends.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

It is now not possible to travel to the Czech Republic for tourism or to visit friends.

It is only possible to travel in cases of absolute necessity, such as trips to work or to do a business activity (including commuters), necessary trips to the family, or trips to the doctor.

Restrictions adopted in the Czech Republic include, for example, the closure of hotels and accommodation facilities (for tourist purposes), the closure of restaurants or a limited movement in public for a maximum of two people together (unless they are members of one household).

questions_answers.question: Can a friend from Germany come to visit me?
questions_answers.value: Not if it's a tourist visit.
